author: joeswatosh
msg: Follow on to r27951 "Fix issue #1893: make svn_client_commitX always
return a valid structure in commit_info_p as promised."
* subversion/bindings/swig/ruby/test/test_client.rb
(SvnClientTest#test_commit): Expect a
Svn::Ext::Core::Svn_commit_info_t with an invalid revision number
instead of nil when nothing is actually committed.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Follow on to r27943 "Mark svn_rangelist_to_stringbuf's rangelist
parameter as 'const'."
* subversion/bindings/swig/core.i
(%apply apr_array_header_t *RANGELIST): Add const apr_array_header_t
*rangelist to %apply.

author: dlr
msg: * INSTALL
Tweak suggested way of building SQLite in thread-safe mode to use
the --enable-threadsafe option to SQLite's configure script.
Incidentally, this option became the default on Sept. 3, 2007:
http://www.sqlite.org/cvstrac/rlog?f=sqlite/configure.ac
Suggested by: philip

author: glasser
msg: Make slightly fewer assumptions about a depth argument.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/reporter.c
(write_path_info): Instead of erroring for svn_depth_unknown and
assuming that anything not in a fixed list is svn_depth_infinity,
explicitly check for svn_depth_infinity and error on anything else.

author: glasser
msg: * subversion/libsvn_repos/reporter.c
(read_path_info): Fix typo in a comment.
